message: This is my first offer. I propose we split the money with a 60/40 ratio in favor of Alice.
I think we can both do better than a 60/40 split.  This is a fairer offer,  and I believe we can come to an agreement.
Considering the inflation, I've adjusted our proposal to a 57/43 split. I hope this offers a more equitable solution.
I think we can both do better by splitting the money evenly.  It's a simple solution that ensures we both get a fair share.
